{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Linksys |model=RE1000 |revision=v1 |upc=745883593088 |ean= |asin=B005FDXMJS |price= |est_release_date=08/11/2011 |fcc_date=07/21/2011 |manuf_country= |manuf=CyberTAN |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=repeater,bridge |fcc_id=Q87-RE1000 |ic_id=3839A-RE1000 |pwr_v=100-240 |pwr_amp=0.5 |pwr_conn=C7 |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac=true |pwr_ac_hz=50/60 |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM5357B0 |cpu1_cspeed=300 |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1=4 |fla1_brand= |fla1_model= |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1=32 |ram1_brand= |ram1_model= |ram1_num= |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM5357B0 |wi1_chip2_brand= |wi1_chip2_model= |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports= |flags= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user= |default_pass=admin |oui=20:AA:4B,58:6D:8F,C8:D7:19 |oui_eth=20:AA:4B,58:6D:8F,C8:D7:19 }} ''Wireless-N Range Extender/Bridge''
{{SupportPage|vendor=Linksys|model=RE1000}} [http://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?t=154741 On the DD-WRT forums] :noted as having 4MB Flash, 32MB RAM [http://kb.linksys.com/Linksys/ukp.aspx?pid=80&app=vw&vw=1&login=1&json=1&docid=728b4d6a49b64beda1b0ec60ffcd7621_Product_Comparison_Chart_for_Linksys_Range_Extenders.xml Per '''Linksys'''], the CPU is clocked @ 300 MHz. "3763-10000602R" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos.
